MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD11 postcode area of Duns. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2PM to safely carry out repair work on our underground cable network on Ainslie Terrace and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:25 PM on Tuesday, 23 February 2021
